comment_body: Boundaries… such as not hacking into peoples things.  Especially after they leave you alone… even their Amazon account too?!  Hmm..   I’d say that’s crossing boundaries!!

Try to pay attention when people are hesitant to do something / say no. We’re usually oblivious to that and think we can talk them into doing what we want, but this is 1) annoying af 2) crossing boundaries.
